content:
Hi there! I’m Lee. In a nutshell i’m a craftswoman who enjoys creating colorful stuff inspired by mother nature.
I’m currently finishing up a Ph.D. in Psychological and Brain Sciences at UC Santa Barbara. My background has provided me with a unique understanding of attention, perception, and emotions—insights that I incorporate into my visual art to engage audiences and craft innovative visual narratives.
I’m fluent in Blender, After Effects, Procreate, Clip Studio Paint, Photoshop, Python, JavaScript, and HTML/CSS. My experience in grad school has prepared me to handle stressful situations and learn new techniques fast. I’m open to opportunities in 2D/3D animation, visual development, illustration, character design or any other related fields. [Resume] [Linkedin]
summary:
Hi there! I’m Lee. In a nutshell i’m a craftswoman who enjoys creating colorful stuff inspired by mother nature.
I’m currently finishing up a Ph.D. in Psychological and Brain Sciences at UC Santa Barbara.
